viewData.name: LG UK6090PUA 49" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart IPS LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG UK6090PUA 49" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart IPS LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 IPS LED Panel, HDR10 & HLG HDR Support 60 Hz Refresh Rate for Smooth Motion. Review LG UK6090
viewData.long_description: Enjoy apps and Internet-based content with the LG UK6090PUA 49" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart IPS LED TV. This 48.5" LED-backlit IPS LCD panel features a native resolution of 3840 x 2160, allowing you to view detailed UHD images, and the 60 Hz refresh rate helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving on-screen objects, and TruMotion 120 technology will digitally enhance the image to further reduce this blur. HDR functionality will provide a wider color gamut and increased brightness with compatible content and devices. As a smart TV with Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity, you'll have access to the LG Content Store to download apps, plus a full web browser for web surfing. You can control the UK6090PUA with just your voice through your Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant device. Its four HDMI inputs will allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
